actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to permit the Small Business Administration to cooperate with profitmaking as well as nonprofitmaking organizations in providing management assistance to small business.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to allow the Small Business Administration to make use of profitmaking organizations in providing management assistance to small businesses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to permit the Small Business Administration to cooperate with profitmaking as well as nonprofitmaking organizations in providing management assistance to small business.
